column4: The terms of the Internet Only data plan basically states I can use the internet only plan for web browsing, messaging, and similar activities but not for something that requires a continuous connection like P2P or web camera broadcasts
Would chat rooms and VoIP fall under the acceptable use side of the terms?
You should ask your provider, this isn't really an Ubuntu question.
This channel is only for Ubuntu support and since it is busy we ask that you take other topics elsewhere.  If you want to discuss something like that you're free to do it in #ubuntu-offtopic.
